definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
period of low water level (winter in north China)
lit. when the seas run dry and the stones go soft (idiom)/fig. forever/until the end of time
lit. the spring comes upon a withered tree (idiom)/fig. to get a new lease on life/to be revived/(of a difficult situation) to suddenly improve

sentences.english: Methods Clinical materials of 7 cases of paraquat poison were reviewed and analysed.
sentences.chinese: 方法對7例百草枯中毒患者臨牀資料進行回顧性分析。

sentences.english: Ginger bacterial wilt is a destructive disease caused by Ralstonia solanacearum.
sentences.chinese: 姜瘟病是一種由青枯勞爾氏菌引起的生薑毀滅性病害。

sentences.english: Vegetation and dry in summer, Mikawa must not flow.
sentences.chinese: 草木夏枯，三川絕而不流。

sentences.english: The long , hot summer scorched the grass .
sentences.chinese: 炎熱的長夏曬枯了青草。

sentences.english: This paper reviews possible role of transporters in paraquat resistance.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要綜述了轉運體在百草枯抗性中的可能作用。

sentences.english: Methods Clinical data of 42 patients with paraquat poisoning was analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顧性分析42例百草枯中毒患者的臨牀資料。

sentences.english: It was a torrid summer day.
sentences.chinese: 炎熱的長夏曬枯了青草。

sentences.english: Heart, broken on the ground, with a dry spent.
sentences.chinese: 心，碎在地上，隨着花枯了。

sentences.english: Conclusion Trinity is cure and nursing paraquat intoxication of patients with effective method.
sentences.chinese: 結論三位一體是救治及理百草枯中毒患者的有效方法。

sentences.english: The bleak breeze blights the brightly blooming blossom.
sentences.chinese: 蕭瑟的微風吹枯了盛開着的花。

sentences.english: What happened to the bowl that was in the chapel near the broken oak?
sentences.chinese: 枯橡樹附近的小禮拜堂裏的金盃除了什麼事？

sentences.english: His son rushed out and went to the fields to look at the sprouts; it turned out that the sprouts had all withered.
sentences.chinese: 他的兒子跑著到田裏去看苗，苗原來都已經枯了。

sentences.english: Every age, vegetation, as severe drought during is extremely rabbit dead, group of hawk Xiao auction abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 歲逢大旱，草木盡枯，獐兔競死，羣隼枵腹。

sentences.english: Or new love pine at them beyond tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 新生的愛情活不到明天就枯凋。

sentences.english: Grace will last, beauty will blast.
sentences.chinese: 美貌會枯蔞，優雅將永存。

sentences.english: At this moment, only endless thoughts in that dry die in a prison of the branches swaying.
sentences.chinese: 此時此刻，惟有無盡的思念在那枯瘐的枝頭搖曳。

definition: autumn frost/fig. white hair as sign of old age
to wither (and drop off)/to wilt/to pass away
to rustle in the air/to rustle/to sough/bleak/desolate/chilly
